title: Reed Gunther, Vol. 1: The Bear-Riding Cowboy
description: Everyone''s favorite bear-riding cowboy gallops into his first collected edition Reed Gunther and his trusty grizzly bear steed bumble their way through the Wild West fighting giant snakes, hoards of mole creatures, a resurrected John Henry zombie, freak show freaks, special government agents, and all sorts of wild monsters created by an ancient, mysterious Idol This colored collection of excitement, friendship, and adventure is fun for folks of all ages
author: Shane Houghton
